Name: MENOS: PSI-SHATTER
About the game: A high impact, physics based Shooter with a Telekinetic protagonist. Throw enemies and pick up weapons with your mind while battling through the depths of Site Echo, a research facility losing control of a world consuming force. FEATURES: - 30 stages of fierce, tactical, close-quarters combat. - Throw enemies into one another with your mind or use the environment as your weapon. - Switch weapons on the fly by pulling the guns of fallen enemies into your trigger hand.
